thing-type.label: Actor
thing-type.description: A Fibaro Actor device i.e. a device which supports altering its value/state. This could for example be a switch, a dimmer or a thermostat. The Actor thing supports a variety of channels. If this is a switch, enable the switch channel. By default only the dead channel is active indicating id this z-wave device is marked dead by the controller.

parameter.name: id
parameter.label: Device id
parameter.description: The z-wave device id on the Fibaro controller

channel-type.label: Switch
channel-type.description: Channel to control a binday switch

channel-type.label: Dead
channel-type.description: Channel which holds a z-wave device dead status (i.e. configured but not connected to the controller)

channel-type.label: Energy
channel-type.description: Channel which reads the total energy consumption of this device in kWh

channel-type.label: Power
channel-type.description: Channel which reads the current power usage of this device in W
